title: The Claiming of Angelica, the Supernatural Sleuth: Her Erotic Adventures in the Kaiju Kingdom
description: This is a very explicit sex story of the Claiming of Angelica, a supernatural sleuth who investigates mysterious paranormal events. She enters into the dangerous waters of the Pacific Rim to investigate strange paranormal sightings of Kaiju. In her explorations, Angelica encounters masterful and seductive creatures including a Captain and a lusty First Mate who take control of her submissive body and force her to submit to waves of sexual pleasure intertwined with pain. This is a work of fiction meant for those over the age of consent and contains elements of dubious consent, dominant male, submissive female, and paranormal encounters.
author: Bella Swann
